title: Ace of Spade: The Case of One Eyed Jack
description: Private Eye Ace Harker, knew it was going to be one of those days when he awoke from a night of drinking to find a naked woman passed out on the floor of his office.  After listening to who she was and what she wanted, he reluctantly agrees to take her case. Only to discover that the closer he gets to solving it, the more dangerous and bizarre it becomes.  Now trapped between two rival crime families, corrupt government officials, and an old friend he would rather forget. Ace must use every trick he has to not only prevent intergalactic war but also survive long enough to get paid for it.
author: James Wraieth
